org.platanios.learn.optimization

Class AbstractStochasticIterativeSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.platanios.learn.optimization.AbstractStochasticIterativeSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Solver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdaptiveGradientSolver, StochasticGradientDescentSolver

    abstract class AbstractStochasticIterativeSolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements Solver
    TODO: Generalize the support for regularization. I could add a addRegularization(RegularizationType) method to add many and any kind of regularizations.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Antonios Platanios

        public abstract void updateDirection()

      • updatePoint

        public abstract void updatePoint()
        Note 1: Care must be taken when implementing this method to include the relevant cases for when \(L_1\) or \(L_2\) regularization is used. Note 2: Care must be taken when implementing this method because the previousPoint entityType is simply updated to point to currentPoint, at the beginning of each iteration. That means that when the new value is computed, a new object has to be instantiated for holding that values.
